remarks: A cancellation law for division.  ( ~ diveq1 analog.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dvreq1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
dvreq1.o $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
dvreq1.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
dvreq1.t $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
dvreq1 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( ( X ./ Y ) = .1. <-> X = Y ) ) $.
